patterns: How can i set this filed show after yes selected
I want the text field show after option selected
responses: You can click the "condition" icon, then you can set the display condition

patterns: How to add a new form

responses: Click form edit button, and set "eBookingUpdate" action with "formSubmit" execution level. The actions can find on post-action tab, which in step 2 of form creation
Click form edit button, and set "uploadPdf" action with "onApiCall" execution level. The actions can find on post-action tab, which in step 2 of form creation

patterns: How to auto fill form data
responses: You can pass data model through query string, but the data model must match the form field model. e.g. query string should look like xxx?name=TaiMan, then the form must have a filed with model key name
You can use "dataToken" to auto fill in form data. Please check dataToken for detail

patterns: Fail to upload form record to cms
responses: You should check the cms permission and blob storage setting

patterns: Fail to upload form record to booking
responses: You should check the permission and the cloud service security setting
